verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> vay-Hi came דְבַר־ <WH1697> de-var- And the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> 'e-Lai to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- Son אָדָ֕ם <WH120> 'a-Dam of man מַה־ <WH4100> mah- how יִּֽהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> yih-Yeh become עֵץ־ <WH6086> 'etz- tree הַגֶּ֖פֶן <WH1612> hag-Ge-fen What is the vine מִכָּל־ <WH3605> mik-kol any עֵ֑ץ <WH6086> 'Etz; more than any tree הַזְּמוֹרָ֕ה <WH2156> haz-ze-mo-Rah [or than] a branch אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which הָיָ֖ה <WH1961> ha-Yah is among בַּעֲצֵ֥י <WH6086> ba-'a-Tzei which is among the trees הַיָּֽעַר׃ <WH3293> hai-Ya-'ar. comb

הֲיֻקַּ֤ח <WH3947> ha-yuk-Kach be taken מִמֶּ֙נּוּ֙ <WH4480> mi-Men-nu Can עֵ֔ץ <WH6086> 'Etz, Shall wood לַעֲשׂ֖וֹת <WH6213> la-'a-Sot thereof to do לִמְלָאכָ֑ה <WH4399> lim-la-Chah; anything אִם־ <WH518> 'im- or יִקְח֤וּ <WH3947> yik-Chu can take מִמֶּ֙נּוּ֙ <WH4480> mi-Men-nu at יָתֵ֔ד <WH3489> ya-Ted, a pin לִתְל֥וֹת <WH8518> lit-Lot of it to hang עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> 'a-Lav and כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- any כֶּֽלִי׃ <WH3627> Ke-li. any vessel

הִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> hin-Neh If לָאֵ֖שׁ <WH784> la-'Esh into the fire נִתַּ֣ן <WH5414> nit-Tan Behold it is cast לְאָכְלָ֑ה <WH402> le-'och-Lah for fuel אֵת֩ <WH853> 'et שְׁנֵ֨י <WH8147> she-Nei both קְצוֹתָ֜יו <WH7098> ke-tzo-Tav the ends אָכְלָ֤ה <WH398> 'a-che-Lah devoureth הָאֵשׁ֙ <WH784> ha-'Esh the fire וְתוֹכ֣וֹ <WH8432> ve-to-Cho of it and the midst נָחָ֔ר <WH2787> na-Char, of it is burned הֲיִצְלַ֖ח <WH6743> ha-yitz-Lach Is it meet לִמְלָאכָֽה׃ <WH4399> lim-la-Chah. business

הִנֵּה֙ <WH2009> hin-Neh Behold בִּֽהְיוֹת֣וֹ <WH1961> bih-yo-To become תָמִ֔ים <WH8549> ta-Mim, Behold when it was whole לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo is not יֵֽעָשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> ye-'a-Seh it was meet לִמְלָאכָ֑ה <WH4399> lim-la-Chah; for no work אַ֣ף <WH637> 'af How כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- when אֵ֤שׁ <WH784> 'esh when the fire אֲכָלַ֙תְהוּ֙ <WH398> 'a-cha-Lat-hu hath devoured וַיֵּחָ֔ר <WH2787> vai-ye-Char, it and it is burned וְנַעֲשָׂ֥ה <WH6213> ve-na-'a-Sah how much less shall it be meet ע֖וֹד <WH5750> od still לִמְלָאכָֽה׃ <WH4399> lim-la-Chah. yet for [any] work ס sa-Mek

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> la-Chen, Therefore כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> koh thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> 'a-Mar Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> Yah-weh, GOD כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher which עֵץ־ <WH6086> 'etz- tree הַגֶּ֙פֶן֙ <WH1612> hag-Ge-fen As the vine בְּעֵ֣ץ <WH6086> be-'Etz among the trees הַיַּ֔עַר <WH3293> hai-Ya-'ar, of the forest אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which נְתַתִּ֥יו <WH5414> ne-tat-Tiv which I have given לָאֵ֖שׁ <WH784> la-'Esh to the fire לְאָכְלָ֑ה <WH402> le-'och-Lah for fuel כֵּ֣ן <WH3651> ken so נָתַ֔תִּי <WH5414> na-Tat-ti, so will I give אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יֹשְׁבֵ֖י <WH3427> yo-she-Vei the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim. of Jerusalem

וְנָתַתִּ֤י <WH5414> ve-na-tat-Ti And I will set אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- פָּנַי֙ <WH6440> pa-Nai my face בָּהֶ֔ם ba-Hem, מֵהָאֵ֣שׁ <WH784> me-ha-'Esh from [one] fire יָצָ֔אוּ <WH3318> ya-Tza-'u, against them they shall go out וְהָאֵ֖שׁ <WH784> ve-ha-'Esh and [another] fire תֹּֽאכְלֵ֑ם <WH398> toch-Lem; shall devour וִֽידַעְתֶּם֙ <WH3045> vi-da'-Tem them and ye shall know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- when אֲנִ֣י <WH589> 'a-Ni I יְהוָ֔ה <WH3069> Yah-weh, God בְּשׂוּמִ֥י <WH7760> be-su-Mi when I set אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- פָּנַ֖י <WH6440> pa-Nai my face בָּהֶֽם׃ <WH99999> ba-Hem.

וְנָתַתִּ֥י <WH5414> ve-na-tat-Ti And I will make אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz the land שְׁמָמָ֑ה <WH8077> she-ma-Mah; desolate יַ֚עַן <WH3282> Ya-'an because מָ֣עֲלוּ <WH4603> Ma-'a-lu because they have committed מַ֔עַל <WH4604> Ma-'al, a trespass נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> ne-'Um saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3069> Yah-weh. GOD פ Peh
